component.text:
Upon completion of this chapter, you will be able to:

  • Describe the benefits of Frame Relay.
  • Explain Frame Relay operation.
  • Explain bandwidth control mechanisms in Frame Relay.
  • Configure a basic Frame Relay PVC on a router serial interface.
  • Configure point-to-point subinterfaces.
  • Use show and debug commands to troubleshoot Frame Relay.
